The Color Monitor backpanel () has these connections:
Power connections: 120VAC, 230VAC, and 24VDC (230VAC is optional and requires a different transformer.)
Modbus connections:
Downstream (to Monitor device chain) is always 4-wire Modbus.
Upstream is 4-wire or 2-wire, jumper selected.
Modbus RTU interface is isolated.
Summary Alarm: Dry contact (NO) signals when any device in the Monitorâ€™s device chain has an alarm condition. The backpanel also has a RESET button: If the Monitor hangs, you can reset it by pressing this button.
